title: Anzio 1968
description:
Screen greats Robert Michum. Peter Falk and Arthur Kennedy star in the riveting war drama "Anzio," a vivid portrait of one of the bloodest WWII battles ever fought. After landing with Allied troops at Anzio, Italy, in 1944,

Dick Ennis (Mitchum) and buddy Corporal Rabinoff (Falk) tell Anzio commander General Lesler (Kennedy) that the road to Rome is wide open. But instead of heading to Rome, Lesley attempts to build a coastal stronghold, only to discover that the Germans have outflanked them by enclosing the Anzio beachhead. Four months and over 30,000 casualties later, the Allied forces smash through the German lines and victoriously march to Rome
